Description: Fragment of oval handle to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, worn. Name Timo. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, BIBALEX 0152.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (96)
